content:
Is there any way to extend our deadline for the checkoffs? I've tried twice today (30 mins each) waiting in the queue, and I've even been at position 77, and I'm not confident all of us will be able to go/ all of us will have breaks in our schedules long enough to wait through the queue before Friday for checkoff 4 and Thurs for checkoff 3

(this is no complaint to the TAs answering questions and doing checkoffs, it's all been super helpful!)
subject: Extend Checkoff Deadline

content: I second this. I've been in the help queue for almost two hours, and I've only moved from 65 to 24.
I'm in that same boat, except I haven't even been able to do my checkoff 3 yet.
Please consider moving it. Its also making it really hard to get help for pset 4, which is making it harder to get the pset 4 checkoff done early... do we see the problem
I also just waited in the queue for three hours and never got help. I got to the end of the queue but no one came to my zoom link and now it is closed.
